name: csc543-nim-game
description: - Cards glow when hovered over - Turns are counted and displayed on the page - Button to submit the card selection and pass the turn - An option to bring up an element with instructions     - A video/gif demo of how to play, to be included with instructions - A reset game button - A front-end script to manage the page - A separate module to manage the game state, could be front or back end - An app.js to manage the server-side routing. Will return the landing game page
